clients.jobTask: Designed and developed a fully custom Next.js website for Naramata Vineyard BnB, including domain setup, managed hosting, and deployment via Heroku. Built with a focus on fast performance, responsive design, and SEO to highlight the property’s wine-country experience while keeping content updates and booking inquiries simple for the owners.

Act as the current website developer and digital support lead for Little Engine Wines, maintaining and optimizing their WordPress platform to ensure peak performance and a polished user experience. Responsibilities include site updates, troubleshooting, and implementing SEO and UX enhancements to align with the brand’s premium identity and elevate online engagement for their wine club and visitors.

Serve as the current website developer and technical manager for Rent SOPM, overseeing ongoing updates, performance optimization, and SEO improvements. While the original site was pre-existing, I’ve enhanced its functionality, improved load times, refined UI consistency, and implemented strategic content updates to support stronger visibility and lead generation across the Okanagan property management market.

Developed a custom WordPress website for Wild Care Garden Design, hosted on my managed WordPress platform. The project focused on showcasing sustainable landscape design services through a clean, nature-inspired layout with responsive functionality and SEO optimization. Implemented speed enhancements, contact integrations, and analytics tracking to support both performance and lead generation.

Designed and developed a custom WordPress website for Mastering Menopause Naturally, hosted on my managed WordPress platform. The site was built to highlight holistic wellness services and educational resources, featuring optimized layouts, responsive design, and SEO best practices to improve visibility and user engagement. Integrated performance enhancements and analytics tools to ensure a seamless, high-performing user experience.

Updated their existing website, which had not been refreshed for several years. This involved a comprehensive update of all services offered to ensure the information was current and accurate. Additionally, I added new stock images to enhance the website's visual appeal and better represent the brand's identity. Finally, I implemented SEO strategies to improve the website's search engine visibility, aiming to drive more organic traffic and increase online presence.

Updated the website to include this year's program. As part of the marketing team, I collaborated on a comprehensive website makeover, ensuring the design and content were refreshed and aligned with current branding. Additionally, I implemented SEO optimization strategies to enhance search engine visibility and drive more organic traffic to the site.

Assisted with their ecommerce site by providing SEO optimization and launch support. This included troubleshooting domain issues to ensure a smooth launch and enhancing search engine visibility to drive more organic traffic to the site.

Updated their Shopify checkout using Shopify Liquid to include an interactive calendar, allowing customers to easily view their estimated product delivery date. This enhanced the user experience by providing clear and accurate delivery timelines.

Developed a personal profile website using React, integrating React Helmet for optimized SEO. This project focused on enhancing visibility and search engine rankings while delivering a streamlined and user-friendly experience.

Developed a Shopify store to sell merchandise, focusing on creating a seamless shopping experience and optimizing the platform for eCommerce success. This involved customizing the store layout, integrating product management, and ensuring a user-friendly interface for customers.
